meanings.definition: A person or group authorized to act on behalf of another
meanings.sent1: The mandataries were trusted to make decisions for their clients.
meanings.sent2: The mandataries signed the contract on behalf of the company.
meanings.sent3: The mandataries had a meeting to discuss the best course of action for their client.
meanings.sent4: The mandataries were like the hands and feet of the person they represented.
meanings.sent5: The responsibility of the mandataries was to ensure the wishes of their clients were carried out accurately.

meanings.definition: Those who receive a mandate or instruction
meanings.sent1: The mandataries eagerly awaited the instructions from their superiors.
meanings.sent2: The mandataries followed the mandate given to them without question.
meanings.sent3: The mandataries joked about receiving a secret mission from headquarters.
meanings.sent4: The mandataries were like messengers receiving their orders from above.
meanings.sent5: The group of mandataries gathered around to hear the latest mandate from their leader.
